SEARCH
Package io.brane.core.model

Record Class Transaction

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
io.brane.core.model.Transaction
Record Components:
hash - the transaction hash (required)
from - the sender address (required)
to - the recipient address (null for contract creation)
input - the input data (required, may be empty)
value - the value transferred (required)
nonce - the transaction nonce (required)
blockNumber - the block number containing this transaction (null if pending)
public record Transaction(Hash hash, Address from, Address to, HexData input, Wei value, long nonce, Long blockNumber) extends Record
Represents a blockchain transaction.

Required fields (never null):

  • hash - the transaction hash
  • from - the sender address
  • input - the input data (may be empty)
  • value - the value transferred
  • nonce - the transaction nonce

Optional fields (use *Opt() accessors):

  • to - the recipient address (null for contract creation)
  • blockNumber - the block number (null if pending)

API Design Note

Optional fields use nullable types with explicit *Opt() accessor methods (e.g., toOpt(), blockNumberOpt()) rather than Optional<T> record components. This design:

  • Keeps record components simple and serialization-friendly
  • Provides explicit opt-in for Optional handling when needed
  • Allows null checks with standard == null patterns
Since:
0.1.0-alpha
